description.title: Tenscan RPC: eth_getStorageAt for personal transactions (transparent contract)
description.purpose:
A non-ephemeral account first performs five transactions against a transparent contract. An ephemeral account then queries to get their personal transactions, where they themselves have not submitted any. This is performed for both cases where they request for just their personal transactions, and their personal and public transactions. It is assumed that for the latter they will see the transactions made against the transparent contract, but for the former they will not.
Skipped as showing public and synthetic transactions in the call to get personal transactions is not supported for the mainnet phase 1 release.

skipped.reason: Public and synthetic transactions in the call to get personal transactions is not yet supported
